video.title: American Pickers: Collection
video.synopsis: Hosts Frank Fritz and Mike Wolfe scour America to find antiques and collectibles to sell at their stores or add to their personal collections.

episodes.synopsis: Mike and Frank find a 12-foot-high sign of the iconic Philip Morris bellhop. They buy a Japanese samurai sword used in World War II and an old saddle.
episodes.title: Big Bear

episodes.synopsis: Mike's and Frank's strategy of picking becomes clear as they use a motorcycle part found at an earlier pick to help close the deal on a rare scooter.
episodes.title: Super Scooter

episodes.synopsis: The guys stumble across an amazing junkyard in Maryland. Frank offers big money for a 1939 Plymouth, but the collector doesn't want to part with it.
episodes.title: Frank's Gamble

episodes.synopsis: The guys are in Kentucky, and they're driving Danielle crazy. Whenever she comes up with a new lead, they toss a coin to decide whether they'll go.
episodes.title: Frank Flips

episodes.synopsis: The guys are dreaming of a California score when they stumble upon a salvage yard that's been in a family for generations.
episodes.title: Frank's Big Shot

episodes.synopsis: In Arizona, the guys meet a lifetime picker whose old-timey ranch is full of treasures, and Mike is ecstatic to find an original Airstream trailer.
episodes.title: Airstream Dream

episodes.synopsis: Picking their way through Florida, the guys find an unusual motorcycle sidecar, a film prop used by Vin Diesel, taxidermy bears and much more.
episodes.title: Frank Bears All

episodes.synopsis: In Texas, the guys visit a funeral director who's collected embalming tables and neon crucifixes, and a man's personal museum with 200,000 rare items.
episodes.title: Frank's Pacemaker

episodes.synopsis: The guys score a huge elephant head from a Maine taxidermist. A collection in New Hampshire offers maritime antiques and a bejeweled hot dog steamer.
episodes.title: The Elephant in the Room

episodes.synopsis: A trip through Tennessee and Mississippi yields a Studebaker car jack, a 1950s Williams Times Square pinball machine and an Ingo bike.
episodes.title: Picker Man Blues

episodes.synopsis: While Frank is stuck caring for his mom's dogs, Mike heads to Virginia and lands a Wayne Atlantic clock-faced gas pump, some Amoco items and more.
episodes.title: Frank's Dog Days

episodes.synopsis: Visiting the Museum of Appalachia in Clinton, Tennessee, the guys are given access to a museum overflow storage facility packed with unique items.
episodes.title: Pickers in the Attic

episodes.synopsis: Frank picks up a vintage Harley Sportster in upstate New York, then in the city mistakenly ends up on the set of "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire."
episodes.title: The Million Dollar Mistake

episodes.synopsis: The guys pick through an antiques-packed two-story farmhouse rumored to be haunted, and then score a pristine set of vintage Beatles bobbleheads.
episodes.title: Haunted Honeyhole

episodes.synopsis: Mike hopes to land a 1944 Knucklehead Harley, but he has to play it cool while bidding on it. Meanwhile, a gun appraisal gets Danielle excited.
episodes.title: White Knuckles
